To his special lord icome of kynges blood
Ti Sire Phelyp þe eldest sone
and heire of þe passyng clere man Sire Phelyp
by the grace of God most noble kyng of Frensch men
of þe ordre of frere heremytes of Seint Austeyn
þat is sentens of resonable rule
noþer al gouernans bien imete with euene duryng of tyme
and som ben idemed perpetual by heritage
þat non violent thyng is perpetual
þat desireþ to make his principate perpetual in hymself
and successours schal study with gret bysynesse
þat is gouer nans be kyndelich
Neuer man is made kyndelich rector
zif he desireþ to be prince by passioun
Bot gif he is a kepere of rigt he schal ordeyne to commaunde no thing with oute resoun
as he is kyndelich a seruant
and redy of gouernans | is kyndelich a lord
for youre gloryous nobilte requyred me frendly to compone or make a boke of loore of princes oþer of gouernans of kynges
and loke besilich gouernans of a regne by lawe
þat is to say hym passyng
þat þis peticion is iaxed by excityng of God
þat almygty God in whos hemme it is iwrete
” haþ special cure of zoure holy hous
and worthi childhode to folwe þe fores of youre forfadres in þe whiche was gret
and parfite loue of þe fey
And Cristene religioun desireþ to kepe
and saue rigtful rules of þe regne by wit
that I acounte to me precepte
þat is more godelich þan eny synguler profite
an auenture with likynge on þis worke by helpe of God as youre worthi nobelte haþ requyred
